upgrades.changelog:
* Added new Parameters Configurations - details can be found in the engineering sheet for those parameter settings.
    * #5 - enable of disable binary sensor
    * #26 - enable/disable LED activity
    * #27 - configure color blink of LED when motion is detected
    * #28 - temperature offset
    * #29 - light offset
* Fixes issue when Parameter 5 is set to 2 causing motion to not report
* Improves light sensor accuracy by changing brightness coefficient from 0.4 to 1.0
